page.title: 02The Wills Family
page.content: The family house,{Misarden Park,}was built in{1480}by the{Musard}family and added to substantially in the 16th century.Major Tom Wills'Grand_Father came in 1911 and built a new wing in 1915.This was burnt down in 1919 and then rebuilt in 1920_21 by the architect{Sir Edwin Lutyens.}Major Wills himself has lived there since 1982.He has a nanny to look after his son and daughter.Responsible for 12 acres of grounds and 600 acres of wood land are 4 gardeners and 5 woodmen. 11 people are employed to farm Miserden estate. Major Wills is{High Sheriff of {Gloucestershire}this year.He is chairman of the Parish Council,Patron of the church and a governor of the Primary school.He is also joint Master of Fox Hounds of The Cotswold Hunt.
